message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $900,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $900,000 is still above my ideal price point. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for it. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on the product. I hope we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To better align with your budget while still ensuring a fair deal for us, I propose adjusting the price to $850,000. This reflects a compromise that maintains a reasonable profit margin for us while being more accessible to your financial considerations. I look forward to your feedback on this proposal.
